name: Mafia Satan Reckoning
description:
This is a game where you enter Hell to take down Satan's infamous mafia by going straight to the Capo de tutti capi. The only problem is, in this pit of Hell, everything is very fragile.

You'll need to be careful that the floor doesn't subtract beneath your feet as you shoot bullets and lob grenades at the bossman.

How to Play:

WASD to Move

Mouse to Look

Left Mouse to Shoot

Right Mouse to Launch Grenade

E to Grapple

Space to Jump

Kill Mafia Satan and don't fall or die.


Participant Credits:

Chromium - Programming

Cyanide - Uzi & Grenade Model

Maranara - Texturing, Mafia Satan Model, Programming

Parzival - Programming, UI

TabloidA - Programming, UI, Sound, Mine Model
